(millimango) package to pypi.org
================================

PyPi: https://pypi.org/project/millimango/

this is my first package with nothing speacial

Install
~~~~~~~

open CMD / Terminal

.. code:: python

   pip install millimango

How to use
~~~~~~~~~~

-  open your IDEâ€¦

.. code:: python

   from millimango import Mangostk

   m = Mangostk()
   m.trend(open=True)
   m.what_is_it()
   m.how2make(open=True)
   m.ingredient()
   m.showpic()
   m.show_ascii()

dev is me.
